short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Designed for Clarity Voice customers. Make calls with a single click from any number in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Clarity Voice's exclusive extension for Chrome, designed for Clarity Voice customers. Make calls with a single click from your browser – every web phone number is clickable, streamlining your dialing process and boosting productivity.

No more copy-pasting – Clarity Voice extension saves time, streamlines workflows, and lets you focus on what matters most. Effortlessly reach potential clients or stay connected with colleagues.

How to Add the Click-to-Call

1. Ensure you're a Clarity Voice customer with your portal user id and password
2. Open Chrome
3. Go to Chrome Web Store chrome://extensions in the address bar
4. Search "Clarity Voice Click-to-Call" and hit Enter.
5. Click "Add to Chrome" for the Clarity Voice Click-to-Call extension
6. Confirm the pop-up by selecting Add extension
7. Spot the Clarity Voice icon in your browser's toolbar
8. Now, all Chrome phone numbers are clickable, enabling one-click calls with Clarity Voice
